eventInfoList.dialogueText: Hey there, @. How are you doing? You've barely been at home much lately.
I've been doing a little better... so I've gotten my old job back at the police department. I'm going to be working again.
I know I haven't been all there recently, but I want you to know I'm proud of you. You're a tough kid, and that counts for a lot in this world.
I mean it. And once I start getting paid we can hang out and do all sorts of things again!
I... I know you have a lot on in your mind right now, especially with school starting up again so soon.
But I want to ask you, to look out for your sister for me.
I know you guys don't always get along so well. But aside from me, you guys are all eachother have in this world.
It's not easy for you, but it's harder for her. I'm not as close to her as I am to you.
I guess what I'm trying to say, @, is that I've made a lot of mistakes, and you're ending up having to pay for some of them. And I'm sorry about that.
I'll make it up to you both, @. I promise I will, somehow.
I've got to get going now. If you need anything, let me know. I'll see you around, @.
